definition: to congregate/to assemble/to mass/to gather together/to amass/to polymerize

sentences.english: Clustering is the phenomenon whereby firms from the same industry gather together in close proximity.
sentences.chinese: 群聚就是相同行业的企业紧挨着相聚在一起的现象。

sentences.english: White-ants is a social-animal living in dam-body.
sentences.chinese: 土栖白蚁是一种蛀土为巢的群聚体。

sentences.english: The Community variation of the demersal fisheries organisms off Yunlin, S.
sentences.chinese: 云林沿海底拖渔业生物群聚变动之研究。

definition: to flock/to swarm/to congregate en masse/to cluster together
to call up all one's associates/rent-a-crowd
to gather one's friends/to band together
to inhabit a region (esp. ethnic group)/to congregate
(of disparate elements) to mix in with one another/(of diverse groups of people) to live in the same area/to coexist
young people decked out in gorgeous clothes (idiom)
cohabitation (of different populations or races)/to coexist
